alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 18 at 2:45AM EST until December 18 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.2 to 9.7 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding can be expected across low-lying areas of Newport, Middletown and Portsmouth. Several immediate coastal roads will be impassable for a few hours around time of high tide. Minor beach erosion on the south side of Newport is possible. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
